home.title: Thiefdom Solo Helper
home.play1: Play Thiefdom with your guild alone against the guards.
home.play2: This application implements the official solo mode of Thiefdom. It replaces the solo patrol board and the compass and guides you through the game.

setup.title: Setup
setup.gameBoard: Set up the game like a 2-player game. You don't need the patrol boards.
setup.playerBoard: As usual, take a player board and the materials in the color of your guild. However, return planning token #4 back to the box.
setup.rivalThieves: Place 3 rival thieves next to the board.
setup.draftEquipment: To draft equipment, first draw 3 cards, pick 1 of them, then draw 2 cards, again keep 1, then draw another single card from the deck. From the 3 equipment, you can now buy 0â€“2 equipment and distribute it among your thieves as you wish.

ruleChanges.title: Rule Changes in Solo Game
ruleChanges.townsfolkMovement: The townsfolk and rival thief movements are controlled by the application.
ruleChanges.enterLocationRival: If you enter a location with a rival thief, you lose 1 VP per rival thief in that location.
ruleChanges.getArrested: If you get arrested in a solo game, goods are discarded and not placed in the dungeon.
